text: Pōrukkuc cellat taṅkaḷukku vākaṉam tēvaippaṭṭu um'miṭam vantavarkaḷiṭam"uṅkaḷai nāṉ ēṟṟi viṭakkūṭiya vākaṉaṅkaḷ eṉṉiṭam illaiyē" eṉṟu nīr kūṟiya pōtu, (pōrukkākat) tāṅkaḷē celavu ceytu koḷḷa vacatiyillaiyē eṉṟu eṇṇit tukkattāl taṅkaḷiṉ kaṇkaḷil kaṇṇīr vaṭittavarkaḷākat tirumpic ceṉṟu viṭṭārkaḷē avarkaḷ mītum (pōrukkuc cellātatu paṟṟi) evvita kuṟṟamum illai
